DOC.brief_summary: The main aim project implementation evaluation step care model ( SCM ) patient depression 6 treatment option vary intensity setting , include innovative technology ( e-mental health , telephone-based psychotherapy ) . Within complex intervention , patient treat multiprofessional network health care provider Hamburg , Germany . The study compare SCM condition ( intervention group ) control group receive treatment usual ( cluster randomization level participate general practitioner ) . It expect SCM condition show well result regard reduction mental symptom , improvement quality life , efficient access care well cost-benefit ratio .
DOC.brief_title: Cluster Randomized Trial Stepped Care Intervention v . Treatment Usual Patients With Depression
DOC.criteria: > 4 point PHQD9 depression scale sufficient knowledge German language health situation allow questionnaire completion insufficient knowledge German language health situation allow questionnaire completion
